content:
From the lead developer of OpenCPN:

A plugin that is "published" in any way will need to honor the GPL, since it by definition will include wxWidgets linkages. So, in general, the source code must be published as well.
That said, there is a mechanism to include a closed source blob in the plugin, as long as the interface to such blob does not involve direct object linkage.

This does not look good. I need to look at some of my non-related stuff that built a standalone .exe.
